g.title: Sheet.66
g.desc: Process starts on the client: A task sequence running on a cl...
g.text: Process starts on the client: A task sequence running on a client includes the Install Software Updates step.

g.title: Sheet.67
g.desc: Task Sequence Step – Install Software Updates
g.text: Task Sequence Step – Install Software Updates

g.title: Sheet.1021
g.desc: Compile and evaluate policies The client compiles all softwar...
g.text: Compile and evaluate policies The client compiles all software update policies into WMI RequestedConfigs namespace.

g.title: Sheet.1117
g.desc: Is this instance the first time it’s called?
g.text: Is this instance the first time it’s called?

g.title: Sheet.1121
g.desc: Is the step configured to Evaluate software updates from cach...
g.text: Is the step configured to Evaluate software updates from cached scan results?

g.title: Sheet.1124
g.desc: Full scan The task sequence engine calls the software update ...
g.text: Full scan The task sequence engine calls the software update agent via Update Scan API to do a full scan.

g.title: Sheet.1131
g.desc: Scan from cached results The task sequence engine calls the s...
g.text: Scan from cached results The task sequence engine calls the software update agent via Update Scan API to scan against cached metadata.

g.title: Sheet.1134
g.desc: Start timer The task sequence engine starts a timer and waits.
g.text: Start timer The task sequence engine starts a timer and waits.

g.title: Sheet.1140
g.desc: SUM agent scan - full Normal scan process via Windows Update ...
g.text: SUM agent scan - full Normal scan process via Windows Update Agent (WUA), which communicates with software update point running WSUS. It adds any applicable updates to the local update store.

g.title: Sheet.1144
g.desc: SUM agent scan - cached The Windows Update Agent (WUA) checks...
g.text: SUM agent scan - cached The Windows Update Agent (WUA) checks against updates already cached in the local update store.

g.title: Sheet.1152
g.desc: Monitoring The task sequence engine monitors the SUM agent fo...
g.text: Monitoring The task sequence engine monitors the SUM agent for status.

g.title: Sheet.1155
g.desc: What is the response from the SUM agent?
g.text: What is the response from the SUM agent?

g.title: Sheet.1162
g.desc: Has the timer reached the value in task sequence variable SMS...
g.text: Has the timer reached the value in task sequence variable SMSTSSoftwareUpdateScanTimeout? (Default 1 hour)

g.title: Sheet.1174
g.desc: Enumerate update list The SUM agent enumerates the list of up...
g.text: Enumerate update list The SUM agent enumerates the list of updates returned by the scan, determining which are available or mandatory. This list is modified by task sequence variable SMSInstallUpdateTarget.

g.title: Sheet.1179
g.desc: Are there any updates in the list of scan results?
g.text: Are there any updates in the list of scan results?

g.title: Sheet.1189
g.desc: Install updates The task sequence engine calls the SUM agent ...
g.text: Install updates The task sequence engine calls the SUM agent via Update Deployment API to install all available or only mandatory updates.

g.title: Sheet.1191
g.desc: Start timer and show progress The task sequence engine starts...
g.text: Start timer and show progress The task sequence engine starts an installation timer, shows sub-progress at 10% intervals in TS Progress UI, and waits.

g.title: Sheet.1194
g.desc: Monitoring The task sequence engine polls the SUM agent for s...
g.text: Monitoring The task sequence engine polls the SUM agent for status.

g.title: Sheet.1199
g.desc: Has the installation process been inactive for 8 hours?
g.text: Has the installation process been inactive for 8 hours?

g.title: Sheet.1210
g.desc: What is the response from the SUM agent?
g.text: What is the response from the SUM agent?

g.title: Sheet.1219
g.desc: SUM agent install Normal install process using existing cache...
g.text: SUM agent install Normal install process using existing cached list of updates, with standard content download. Install update via Windows Update Agent (WUA).
